- Location: Column 3
- Date: Domitian
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna003.pdf#page=97){target="_blank"}  
- Bibliography: @sauneron-8, pp. 35-39. See also [Tempeltexte 2.0](http://www.tempeltexte.uni-tuebingen.de/portal/#/text-detail/940){target="_blank"} 


<div class="col2">  

^1^ *ỉr(.t) p(ȝ) wdn n N.t   *  
*m hrw pn mỉ rʿ-nb  *  
*ḏd-mdw  *  

^1^ Performing the litany of Neith  
on this day like every day.  
Words spoken:  

</div>

<div class="col2">

*wdn n N.t wr.t  *  
*mw.t-nṯr nb(.t) tȝ-sn.t  *    
*m rn(.w)=s nb(.w)*  
*ḥr-tp ʿnḫ-wḏȝ-snb  *  
*n nsw.t-bỉty  *  
*(pr-ʿȝ <ʿnḫ> ḏ.t)|  *  
  
Offering for Neith the great,   
Mother of God, Lady of Esna,   
in all her names,  
in addition to the life, prosperity, health    
for the King of Upper and Lower Egypt,  
(Pharaoh <living> forever)|   

</div>
